forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As the mid-morning sun graces Downtown San Francisco, a gentle radiance spills over the city, offering a moment of clarity beneath an expansive sky. Today, the weather unfolds mostly sunny, with temperatures flirting with the comfortable embrace of the low seventies, an invitation to emerge and revel in the warmth. However, by afternoon, a cool whisper will subtly lower the temperature to around 68, carried by a persistent west-southwest breeze that dances through the streets at 13 to 24 mph. Gusts, reaching up to 30 mph, add a spirited touch to the atmosphere, illuminating the interplay between sunlight and the ever-present Pacific influence.

Tonight, the charming clear view will gently yield to a cloak of clouds, as the low settles around 58. The same breezy whispers will continue, concealing the remnants of the sun and creating a softer ambiance. In this blend of pleasant conditions, it would be wise to dress in layers—perhaps a light sweater to navigate the evening chill without sacrificing style. Given the refreshing weather, a stroll along the Embarcadero could provide a serene escape; the sound of the waters mingling with laughter over coffee at the pier might reveal a restorative charm amidst the urban bustle. Embrace these moments, where simple pleasures meet the splendid rhythm of a bustling city.
